item.description:
Event Features:

Social Mixer, Great Entertainment, and Your Chance To Meet Someone New

Its....The Dating Game!

with your host J.J. Wright and you can be a part of it all!!  Join us on Thursday, May 31st starting at 7PM at the Brighton Beer Garden for so much more fun than you ever thought you could have on a weeknight! You remember the original Dating Game, right?  Well, we are recreating all the fun and frivolity of the original made just for our 45+ Boston singles. We are about to finalize our competing bachelors and bachelorettes, so if you are interested in having your chance in the spotlight, email  info@introductionsbydiana.com today with why you would make the perfect contestant.  And for the rest of us, there are still plenty of chances to answer some questions posed by JJ to our audience, meet other local singles and just have fun! Heavy appetizers and a cash bar will be provided throughout the night.


 

May 31, 2012 7:00pm

(Thursday following Memorial Day Weekend)

Brighton Beer Garden, 386 Market St., Brighton

Advance RSVP required   Only $55.00

**Please note that gender parity is not guaranteed for this event.

 

Event Webpage: http://introductionsbydiana.com/upcoming-events/the-dating-game/

group.name: Boston Baby Boomers Meetup Group-Social Fun

item.name: It's... The Dating Game
